dict.string: Repairs disk permissions. Use when instructed by the helpdesk

#!/usr/bin/python
import plistlib import sys
# Make Munki forget about it
installinfoPath = "/Library/Managed Installs/InstallInfo.plist" installinfo = plistlib.readPlist(installinfoPath)
my_item = 'RepairPermissions'
for item in installinfo.get('optional_installs', []): if item['name'] == my_item: item['installed'] = False
installinfo = plistlib.writePlist(installinfo, installinfoPath)
SelfServeManifestPath = "/Library/Managed Installs/manifests/SelfServeManifest" SelfServeManifest = plistlib.readPlist(SelfServeManifestPath) for item in SelfServeManifest.get('managed_installs', []): if item == my_item: SelfServeManifest['managed_installs'].remove(item)
print SelfServeManifest
SelfServeManifest = plistlib.writePlist(SelfServeManifest, SelfServeManifestPath) sys.exit(0)
